pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Higher-order optimization library
See /Norman Ramsey, Joao Dias, and Simon Peyton Jones./ <http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/simonpj/Papers/c--/hoopl-haskell10.pdf "Hoopl: A Modular, Reusable Library for Dataflow Analysis and Transformation"> /(2010)/ for more details.
